T02D3076b:172a-0: @172a * // mchod rten dang tsha tsha gdab pa yan chad nas bye ba gdab pa la sogs kun kyang /
T02D3076b:172a-1: bsam pa'i rgyud dang sngags ni 'dra ste /
T02D3076b:172a-2: dang por rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi cha byad /
T02D3076b:172a-3: phyag rgya dang sngags su ldan pas bdun yan chad
T02D3076b:172a-4: nyi shu rtsa gcig man chad du chu la bsngags
T02D3076b:172a-5: te / 'jim pa dang yo byad yan chad la gdab bo //
T02D3076b:172a-6: de la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02D3076b:172a-7: rdo rje bcings pa bsngoms te mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa bsgreng /
T02D3076b:172a-8: mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gzhibs te cung zad kyis mi sbyar bar byas la /
T02D3076b:172a-9: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba las mche ba'i tshul du
T02D3076b:172a-10: bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las
T02D3076b:172a-14: 'dis btab pas thams cad gtsang mar bsams pa dang /
T02D3076b:172a-15: bgegs la sogs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3076b:172a-16: aom shuddhe na du sho dha ya /
T02D3076b:172a-18: thams cad gtsang mar bsangs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3076b:172a-19: de'i 'og tu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ba'i sngags la /
T02D3076b:172a-20: na ma stree ya dhvi ya dhvi k'a n'am /
T02D3076b:172a-23: shu bha na aaksho bhya mri ta panytsa bande aa ham /
T02D3076b:172a-27: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am /
T02D3076b:172a-33: ya sho ya sho ba ti /
T02D3076b:172a-34: te dza te dzo ba ti sarba buddh'a shthi te sv'a h'a /
T02D3076b:172a-35: mu dra gdab pa'i 'jim pa'am sngags bri ba'i tshe sngags lan bdun gdab pa'i sngags la /
T02D3076b:172a-36: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D3076b:172a-37: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am /
T02D3076b:172a-38: aom badzra a'a yushe sv'a h'a /
T02D3076b:172a-40: aom badzrod bha ba sv'a h'a /
T02D3076b:172a-42: s'atstsha'i skol phor gyi nang du bye mas gdab pa'am /
T02D3076b:172b-0: snum gyis bsku ba'i sngags la aom badzra dh'a tu garbhe @172b sv'a h'a /
T02D3076b:172b-1: tho bas brdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la /
T02D3076b:172b-2: aom badzra mudg'a ra a'a ko ta ya h'um /
T02D3076b:172b-3: tsee tya phor bu nas dbyung ba'i sngags la /
T02D3076b:172b-5: 'khor lo dang dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la /
T02D3076b:172b-6: aom pra m'arda na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3076b:172b-7: tsee tya dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa'i sngags la /
T02D3076b:172b-8: aom su phra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D3076b:172b-9: cho ga de ltar byas na tsee tya gcig btab pas bye ba snyed btab par 'gyur ro //
T02D3076b:172b-10: skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
T02D3076b:172b-11: dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis
T02D3076b:172b-12: gang na bskus na nad mdze'i rnam pa bco brgyad
